Subject: Announcing WebInterpoint 7.0

Richard:

We are pleased to announce WebInterpoint 7.0 -- the latest release of our popular web conferencing service. The upgrade will occur on Saturday, April 9, 2005 between 2am and 5am EDT.

For a guided tour of the new features on WebInterpoint 7.0, please contact your account manager or call us direct at 888-203-7900.

Here is a list of the improvements:

Improved Application Sharing. Performance has been improved so your sharing sessions will be smoother. A new image scaling feature will automatically fit your content into your viewers' windows. For even better results, you have the option of installing the display driver that we added to the WebInterpoint Installation Kit.

Multiple Presentations. Now you can store multiple PowerPoint presentations in your WebInterpoint account for quick and easy presenting. Create a library so you always have the appropriate content near at hand.

Moderator Group. Now you can appoint one or more moderators to field your audience's chat questions. Now the presenter can concentrate on the presentation while moderators can prepare responses to the audience's chat questions.

Attendee Roster for Participants. You can now enable the Attendee Roster and chat features for attendees. Enable these features for your entire audience, for selected attendees, or restrict them to the presenter and moderator(s).



Like previous upgrades, the new features of WebInterpoint are provided at no additional cost to you.

Conferences that you initiate after the upgrade will automatically use the latest version of WebInterpoint.  We do recommend that you take some time before your next conference to start a WebInterpoint session and familiarize yourself with the new features.

We are very interested in your feedback. If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to contact me directly.

Regards,

Dave Kott, Vice President of Sales and Marketing

Email: dkott@infiniteconferencing.com
